mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_table WHERE u_id = #{id} and is_deleted = 'N'
SELECT * FROM user_table WHERE u_name = #{name} and is_deleted = 'N'
select * from user_table where (u_name = #{account} or u_email = #{account} or u_phone = #{account}) and is_deleted = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into user_table( owned_tenant, u_name, u_real_name, pwd, u_status, u_describe, u_phone, u_email, u_create_time, u_modified_by) values (#{owned_tenant}, #{u_name}, #{u_real_name}, #{pwd}, #{u_status}, #{u_describe}, #{u_phone}, #{u_email}, #{u_create_time}, #{u_modified_by})
mapper.update: update user_table set is_deleted='Y' where (u_name=#{name} and is_deleted='N')
